author: Andre Gide
message: One does not discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.
title: Thought of the day

author: Sai Baba
message: What is new in the world? Nothing. What is old in the world? Nothing. Everything has always been and will always be.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: Genuine love should first be directed at oneself if we do not love ourselves, how can we love others?
title: Thought of the day

author: Tom Lehrer
message: Life is like a sewer. What you get out of it depends on what you put into it.
title: Thought of the day
